title: Natural Acupuncture LLC
cleaned_text: Why Choose Us Professional Affordable Natural Healing Services What do you need Conditions Testimonial Dr. Hong Ma changed my life. I am in Tepoztlan, Mexico living again. After 9 months of 2 to 3 times a week seeing Dr. Hong ma she got rid of my thyroid problem. Just had a blood test done and after 6 months of no acupuncture treatments, my thyroid is still in good condition and I no longer take medication. I absolutely am so grateful to her. Sheema Melissa
